item.title: 美国解释了其对联合国安理会周一通过的呼吁暂停加沙战事的决议投弃权票的原因。罗伯特-伍德副大使说。
item.description:
The U.S. has explained its abstention vote on the U.N. Security Council resolution adopted on Monday that called for a pause to the fighting in Gaza.

"Because the final text did not have a condemnation of Hamas, we could not support it." Deputy Ambassador Robert Wood said. pic.twitter.com/FOhMhiCgyI

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登赢得了密苏里州的民主党总统初选。拜登的获胜毫无悬念，但业内人士仍在密切关注初选的投票率和抗议选民的迹象。

item.title: 周二早些时候在巴尔的摩拍摄的视频显示了弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥被一艘集装箱船撞击后倒塌的瞬间。
item.description:
Video captured early Tuesday in Baltimore shows the moment the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed after it was hit by a container ship. pic.twitter.com/SWaFpD0QOr

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 根据世界水运基础设施协会2018年的一份报告，从1960年到2015年，全球共发生了35起因船舶或驳船碰撞导致的重大桥梁坍塌事故，共有342人丧生。
item.description:
From 1960 to 2015, there have been 35 major bridge collapses worldwide due to ship or barge collision, with a total of 342 people killed, according to a 2018 report from the World Association for Waterborne Transport Infrastructure. https://t.co/FSQlcW7adt

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：检察官宣布达成一项协议，撤销对德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）长达近十年的证券欺诈指控。
item.description:
